verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: canceled] [ARG1: the Super Bowl champion Philadelphia Eagles’ visit to the White House scheduled for Tuesday] . Trump revoked their invitation over ongoing controversy towards players kneeling during the national anthem before games .
